puzzle.L1-P3.title: Security Prompt: Do You Have Access?
puzzle.L1-P3.intro: Respond with an if/else. If access == 'y', unlock the door.
puzzle.L2-P3.title: Bypass the Trap Nodes
puzzle.L2-P3.intro: Write a function safe_nodes(traps) that returns the list of nodes 1..10 excluding any in traps.
puzzle.L3-P1.title: Define Your First Function
puzzle.L3-P1.intro: Write a function disable_drone() that prints exactly: EMP blast triggered. Drone disabled.
puzzle.L3-BOSS.title: Boss: Clean the Signal
puzzle.L3-BOSS.intro: Write clean_signal(s) that keeps only letters/digits/spaces, collapses extra spaces, and returns UPPERCASE.
hint.if_else: Use if/else to branch based on access.
hint.for_loop: Loop over range(1, 11) and skip traps.
hint.list_comprehension: Try [n for n in range(1, 11) if n not in traps].
hint.call_function: Don’t forget to CALL the function at the end.
puzzle.L2-P1.title: Node Sweep
puzzle.L2-P1.intro: Use a for-loop to disable nodes 1 through 5 (print: 'Node X disabled').
puzzle.L3-P2.title: Amplify the Signal
puzzle.L3-P2.intro: Write amplify(msg, times) that returns msg repeated times with no spaces.
puzzle.L3-P3.title: Clean the Boss Signal
puzzle.L3-P3.intro: Write clean_signal(signal) that returns only the letters in signal, removing all other characters.
hint.params: Define function parameters: def fn(a, b):
hint.return_value: Return a value with 'return', don’t print.
hint.isalnum: Filter characters with ch.isalnum() or ch == ' '.
